attributes.action: ensure no British money goes towards educating Palestinians for continued violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is widely reported that Palestinian educational schoolbooks and television are educating for hate and continued violence instead of promoting a peaceful coexistence with Israel.

If it is found that the Palestinians are still educating their youth for a future void of a peaceful coexistence then no more British money should go towards such a project.
